mapper.select:
select b.STCD,b.STNM,Convert(varchar(16),r.TM,120) as TM,r.Q,r.Z,WPTN,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by b.PX asc) AS RowId from (select * from WATER_SITE_B where SYSSIGN=#{showsign}) b inner join ST_Canal_R1 r on b.STCD=r.STCD
b.STNM like '%'+#{stnm}+'%'

select b.STCD,b.STNM,Convert(varchar(10),r.DT,120)+' '+RIGHT('00'+convert(varchar,r.TM),2) as DT,r.A_Q,r.A_Z,r.WQ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by b.PX asc) AS RowId from (select * from WATER_SITE_B where SYSSIGN=#{showsign}) b left join (select * from ST_HCanal_C where DT=#{dt} and tm=#{tm}) r on b.STCD=r.STCD
b.STNM like '%'+#{stnm}+'%'

select b.STCD,b.STNM,r.TM,r.DA_Q,r.DA_Z,r.DWQ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by b.PX asc) AS RowId from (select * from WATER_SITE_B where SYSSIGN='WX') b left join (select * from ST_DCanal_C where TM=#{dt}) r on b.STCD=r.STCD
b.STNM like '%'+#{stnm}+'%'
